name: Slow Down (MayhemCats)
description:
A silly little game about a time-warping bird wizard for the MashUp Game Jam 2!

Controls are simple: ARROW KEYS or WASD to move the character, [SPACE] to go through the dialogue and to use the little time-slowing trick, LEFT-CLICK on the bullets to defend against them and DOWN KEY on the boxes to collect them!

I really wish I  could've made some music for the game, but I didn't have time, so it's kind of silent. I'm sorry about that! 

Description & Thoughts

I've been wanting to make something for the MashUp Game Jam for a while, but I've had no energy whatsoever this week and I was gonna just not make anything until I got a surge of inspiration and made this last-minute entry in 24 hours.  It was a bit of a headache but really fun, and it was nice to just make something!

I'm really sorry if this is very buggy, this is the second game jam I've ever joined and I'm still very new to this whole thing! I tried my best, though!

This was still really fun, though!! I've been ill and it was a nice distraction! I did stress a bit too much on the level design because I had so many ideas and so little time, but I'm still happy I managed to finish anything at all!

All the sprites (or, well, most of them) fit in a 32x32 grid, and both the talk sprites and the overworld sprites for Cuckoo are 32x32! And making them was really fun!! Pixel art is fun and I have to do it more often! Also, I had something in mind for the black & white color palette, but I changed my mind halfway, though I still kept the palette!

I'm still bummed out I couldn't make music in time, though. Aw man.

All art and sounds made by me!

Font used in the game is Press Start 2P!
